questions.question: Who said: When you're with someone, you put up with the stuff that makes you lose respect for them, and that is love.
According to Dwight Schrute, what is the groin of the head?
From the episode on Jan's deposition, who was the other 'woman' Michael referred to in his diary as someone just as hot as Jan but in a different way?
Who's ring was taken from the buttocks of his grandmother, put there by the patriarch of the Coors Dynasty, melted in a foundry run by Menonites?

Complete the last line of Michael's sentence from the Cocktails episode at David Wallace's home:  Rachel thinks that I brought homemade potato salad. But I just picked it up at the supermarket. It's funny. I wish I could make potato salad that good. It's just potatoes and mayonnaise.
questions.answer1: On an unrelated note if you feel sick.. maybe don't eat the mayonnaise
questions.answer2: ...The sun has been beating down on the mayonnaise
questions.answer3: Jan didn't want to come to the cocktail party

questions.question: What is the name of that weird song Jan liked so much from her assistant, Hunter?
questions.answer4: You Took Me By The Hand

questions.question: Who kissed Andy Bernard right before leaving the company?
Why does Michael do a Yoda voice impersonation during his proposal to Holly Flax?
questions.answer2: Yoda voice impersonation was their first love connection
questions.answer3: Michael gets weird and awkward when he's nervous
questions.answer4: They had been doing voice impersonations all day
questions.correctAnswer: Yoda voice impersonation was their first love connection

questions.question: Which character sleeps at the office 4 nights a week?
Why does Pam refuse to go to sports games with Roy?
questions.answer1: She doesn't like sports or Roy's brother
questions.answer2: Somebody threw their drink on her last time she went to a game with him and his brother
questions.answer3: Roy and his brother got very rowdy and competitive at the last College Football game they attended
questions.answer4: Roy left her at a minor league hockey game by accident on their first date
questions.correctAnswer: Roy left her at a minor league hockey game by accident on their first date

questions.question: Which character said: There's too many people on this earth.. We need a new plague
Where was Jim and Pam's first kiss?
questions.answer1: Chilli's at the Dundie Awards Ceremony
questions.correctAnswer: Chilli's at the Dundie Awards Ceremony

questions.question: Which character said: Make friends first, make sales second & make love third.  In no particular order.
